page.title: 09CHANGES IN OUR VILLAGE 2
page.content: THERE ARE STILL SHOPS IN WICKWAR,SPAR, NEWS AGENT,HAIRDRESSERS,ANTIQUE SHOP AND A DRAPERS SHOP.THERE ARE TWO GARAGES IN WICKWAR.IN WICKWAR THERE IS AN INFREEQUENT BUS SERVICE.THERE IS A RAILWAY THAT RUNS THROUGH WICKWAR AND THERE USED TO BE A STATION BUT IT GOT IT WAS KNOCKED DOWN SOMETIME AGO. JUST ALONG THE ROAD USED TO BE A HOTEL CALLED THE RAILWAY INN,BUT IT WAS CLOSED DOWN AND MADE INTO A PRIVATE HOUSE. JUST OUTSIDE WICKWAR THERE IS A POPULAR NURSERY OR "GARDEN CENTRE".THIS IS RUN BY A MR. OSMOND WHO IS VERY WELL KNOWN FOR HIS VAST KNOWLEDGE OF HEATHERS.
